name: Dice Friends
description:
Wizard must make his way to the Sacred Relic with the help of his sentient dice friends.

Controls:

  • Space to Jump and continue dialog
  • WASD to move
  • Hold and release arrow keys to shoot a die
  • r to recall dice
  • Touch the dice to collect them. Fire them into enemies to "roll for attack"

All code and art assets made by two people in 48hrs for GMTK 2022. The last segment is admittedly a little, um, unfair (no, the yellow enemies weren't supposed to be immortal and the projectiles weren't supposed to launch you. Oh well — such is the nature of game jams.)

Audio credit:

  • SFX: https://opengameart.org/content/sfx-the-ultimate-2017-16-bit-mini-pack
  • Music: Moonsong by DMDokuro https://dmdokuro.bandcamp.com/album/dm-dokuro-presents-cave-story-arranged
    • Youtubehttps://www.youtube.com/user/SUPEREMERALD123
